name: nbior

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wo(w0, w1))
-| wi(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wo(w0, w1))
-| wi(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: If two propositions are not equivalent, then at least one is true. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jan-2020.)
